    • Method Detail

      • signEthKMSTransaction

        public String signEthKMSTransaction​(TransactionKMS tx,
                                    String fromPrivateKey,
                                    boolean testnet,
                                    String provider)
                             throws Exception
        Sign Ethereum pending transaction from Tatum KMS
        Parameters:
        tx - pending transaction from KMS
        fromPrivateKey - private key to sign transaction with.
        testnet - mainnet or testnet version
        provider - url of the Ethereum Server to connect to. If not set, default public server will be used.
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        Exception - the exception

      • prepareStoreDataTransaction

        public String prepareStoreDataTransaction​(CreateRecord body,
                                          String provider)
                                   throws ExecutionException,
                                          InterruptedException
        Sign Ethereum Store data transaction with private keys locally. Nothing is broadcast to the blockchain.
        Parameters:
        body - content of the transaction to broadcast
        provider - url of the Ethereum Server to connect to. If not set, default public server will be used.
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - the execution exception
        InterruptedException - the interrupted exception

      • prepareEthOrErc20SignedTransaction

        public String prepareEthOrErc20SignedTransaction​(TransferEthErc20 body,
                                                 String provider)
                                          throws ExecutionException,
                                                 InterruptedException
        Sign Ethereum or supported ERC20 transaction with private keys locally. Nothing is broadcast to the blockchain.
        Parameters:
        body - content of the transaction to broadcast
        provider - url of the Ethereum Server to connect to. If not set, default public server will be used.
        Returns:
        the string
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - the execution exception
        InterruptedException - the interrupted exception

      • sendStoreDataTransaction

        public TransactionHash sendStoreDataTransaction​(boolean testnet,
                                                CreateRecord body,
                                                String provider)
                                         throws ExecutionException,
                                                InterruptedException,
                                                IOException
        Send Ethereum store data transaction to the blockchain. This method broadcasts signed transaction to the blockchain. This operation is irreversible.
        Parameters:
        testnet - mainnet or testnet version
        body - content of the transaction to broadcast
        provider - url of the Ethereum Server to connect to. If not set, default public server will be used.
        Returns:
        the transaction hash
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - the execution exception
        InterruptedException - the interrupted exception
        IOException - the io exception

      • sendEthOrErc20Transaction

        public TransactionHash sendEthOrErc20Transaction​(boolean testnet,
                                                 TransferEthErc20 body,
                                                 String provider)
                                          throws ExecutionException,
                                                 InterruptedException,
                                                 IOException
        Send Ethereum or supported ERC20 transaction to the blockchain. This method broadcasts signed transaction to the blockchain. This operation is irreversible.
        Parameters:
        testnet - mainnet or testnet version
        body - content of the transaction to broadcast
        provider - url of the Ethereum Server to connect to. If not set, default public server will be used.
        Returns:
        the transaction hash
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - the execution exception
        InterruptedException - the interrupted exception
        IOException - the io exception
